title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10: Specs, pricing, and everything else
content:

The post Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10: Specs, pricing, and everything else appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lenovo has introduced the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 at CES 2022, and it's a big upgrade in more than one way. Here's everything we know.
